description: AI-generated deepfake videos of celebrities continue to raise concern and this time it’s Aroob Jatoi, wife of top Pakistani YouTuber ‘Ducky Bhai’. description: PESHAWAR – More rains and isolated hailstorms are expected in Peshawar and parts of Khyber Pakhtunkhwa on Sunday evening/night, Monday and Tuesday. description: ISLAMABAD – Foreign Minister Ishaq Dar has been appointed as the Deputy Prime Minister of Pakistan. “The Prime Minister has been pleased to designate Mr Mohammad Ishaq Dar, Federal Minister for Foreign Affairs, as Deputy Prime Minister with immediate effect and until further orders,”  reads the notification issued by Cabinet Division on Sunday.
